value:
Seeing those two kids all grown up
and treating me with respect... Guess
it's proof of how old I've gotten.

Everyone in my band has serious skill.
Some of 'em aren't the most reliable,
but even Shanna is the real deal.

I ain't slackin' off. When it's time to
rest, I rest. When it's time to eat, I
eat. Might die tomorrow, after all.

Sneaking up on a merc? You want to
get chopped in half? Though to be
fair, I did see you comin'.

The most important thing? Training.
Next most? Training. In this line of
work, you have to hone yourself.

You $Nu?
Got word from
$Nf.

Body is movin' just like I want.
Nobody's gonna beat me today!
Who's next?

No shortcuts on the battlefield.
Training's all you got.

Seems like the wind's not blowin'
my way... May be time to pack it in
for today.

Well, aren't you fancy? For this,
I'll put in the work. No problem.

You my new employer? If you want
to hire Dieck, you better be ready to
pay for Dieck.

So, when's the next battle? Actually,
before that, we need to talk.$k$pTo put it plain, I don't get you. Battle
is serious, bloody business. You learn
about someone on the battlefield...$k$pAnd what I learned is that you don't
take it seriously. Do you understand
the stakes? It doesn't seem like it.$k$pThat's why you hired me? Hah! Can't
argue with that logic. Guess you got
me there.$k$pSeems you do have guts! Well, as
long as you can afford me, I'll stick
by you. Let me know what you need.
でやあっ
決めるぜ
ぐあっ
やるな…！
This wasn't cheap!
In a rush to die?
I'll just end this.
It's your time!
End of the road…
Hmph.
Yo. The name's Dieck. I lead a band of mercenaries.
Whoa! It ain't wise to sneak up on a mercenary, kid.
I used to work for Lord Pent and Lady Louise. They always looked out for me.
In the eyes of the ones giving the orders, mercenaries are just fodder. You've got no choice but to accept that if you make a living of it.
The folks in my crew ain't exactly the easiest to deal with... What can I say?
When you stare into the empty eye sockets of death itself, you learn something about what it means to be alive.
You point at the target, and I handle the steel. I'm the professional.
Yeah, yeah...
What to do...
I'm on it.
